name: launch-pad
description: CODECHECK Launch Pad - A tool to help create new CODECHECK register issues with next available identifiers and correct labels

scripts.download-deps: npm run download-jquery && npm run download-bootstrap && npm run download-papaparse && npm run download-icons
scripts.download-icons: mkdir -p assets/images && curl -o assets/images/icon-email.svg https://raw.githubusercontent.com/codecheckers/codecheckers.github.io/master/img/icon-email.svg && curl -o assets/images/icon-github.svg https://raw.githubusercontent.com/codecheckers/codecheckers.github.io/master/img/icon-github.svg && curl -o assets/images/icon-gitlab.svg https://raw.githubusercontent.com/codecheckers/codecheckers.github.io/master/img/icon-gitlab.svg && curl -o assets/images/icon-mastodon.svg https://raw.githubusercontent.com/codecheckers/codecheckers.github.io/master/img/icon-mastodon.svg && curl -o assets/images/icon-linkedin.svg https://raw.githubusercontent.com/codecheckers/codecheckers.github.io/master/img/icon-linkedin.svg && curl -o assets/images/icon-youtube.svg https://raw.githubusercontent.com/codecheckers/codecheckers.github.io/master/img/icon-youtube.svg

author: CODECHECK Community
